Lord Brahma was pleased with his austerities to atone his offences in Antaradvipa.
Being pleased with his austerities, Supreme Lord Krishna appeared before him and gave his darshan.

There is no other way, there is no other way, there is no other way.
The only way to get delivered from this Kali Yuga is to chant the names of Lord Shri Krishna.
This was the purpose of Lord Brahma's incarnation.
To spread the glories of holy name, Lord Shri Krishna's name and set an ideal example as Namacharya.
Lord Brahma appeared as Haridasa Thakur, stayed here in this Puliya village at this place.
There used to be a cave in this place during those days and a tree where Haridasa Thakur would spend most of his time chanting the names of Lord Shri Krishna.
He would chant 300,000 names of Lord Shri Krishna every day.
He would cry.
He would dance.
Sometimes, sometimes he would fall unconscious chanting the names of Lord Shri Krishna.
Villagers would come here to take association of Haridasa Thakur and chant with him.
But the villagers also noticed there was a black poisonous snake living in the same cave which posed a great threat to Haridasa and other visitors.
So they were very hesitant to visit the place.
Understanding their fear, Haridasa Thakur spoke to the snake and told them,
My dear snake, because of the fear of you, devotees are hesitant to come here and chant with me.
If you don't mind, could you please go somewhere else and live or if you are uncomfortable leaving this place, I would like to go and be somewhere else.
words of Haridas Thakur, the black snake immediately left the place and went away. Seeing this miracle,
the villagers were struck with awe and reverence. Their respect and devotion to Haridas Thakur increased
immensely. This wonderful pastime happened at this place where Haridas Thakur stayed and performed his
Nama bhajana.
Once, Maya Devi herself came to test Srila Haridas Thakur here.
With exquisite beauty, the illusory energy approached Haridas Thakur to allure him.
Srila Haridas Thakur transformed Maya Devi with his association by chanting Hare Krishna Mahamantra.
He requested Maya Devi to sit down and after his bhajan, after his chanting, he will come and
attend to her. The whole day went on chanting Hare Krishna Mahamantra.
Mayadevi, hearing Hare Krishna Chanting Hare Krishna Mantra, had a heart transformation.
In fact, Mayadevi had no impact on Haridas Thakur. At that time, Haridas Thakur was a young man.
With her exquisite beauty, illusory energy could not distract Haridas Thakur
from his determination to worship Supreme Lord, but only with the help of Prasadu.

Hare Krishna Hare Krishna Krishna Krishna Hare Hare Hare Rama Hare Rama Rama Rama Rama Hare Hare
because of his firm determination to chant his great devotion to Hare Krishna mantra he was unaffected by Maya's influence.
This pastime of Haridasa Thakur at Bhulia gives confidence to all devotees that we can be rest assured that Krishna will protect us.
His devotees like Haridasa Thakur and Srila Prabhupada will protect us from the influence of Maya if we strongly hold on to chanting Hare Krishna mantra in our life.
Come, let's offer our prayers to Haridasa Thakur so that we are always...
sincerely engaged in chanting, hearing Hare Krishna Maha Mantra and always remain in the service of Gauranga Maha.
